title: I love time loop movies like this.
review: Solid acting by Jake Gyllenhaal! If you're a fan of time loop movies like me, this is for you.

title: Loved it.
review: Okay, now I ship Jesse and Emma; they'd make a great couple. My brother has been recommending this to me many times, so I gave it a watch. It was worth it; it was really funny and heartwarming, despite the horror parts. Also, I loved their dynamics. It's great that they made a sequel, because the ending isn't enough; I want more!
